message:
للناس اللى إشتغلت Xamarin أو PhoneGap  مين فيهم أحسن؟
و مين ال Quality بتاعة الـ App فى الأخر بتبقى أحسن؟
و PhoneGap بيحتاج MacOS أو iOS عشان تــ Develop بيه iOS Apps ولا عادى؟
و تنصحوا أشتغل بمني فيهم أحسن!

data.message: I recommend to add nativeScript with angular 2 to your choices

Xamarin is better if your background is C#, and also it's faster and has better performance because of it's compiled to native code.

PhoneGap is better if your background is Javascript, but it's slower  and haven't access to all native features as it runs as a hybrid app 

I also suggest to consider Titanium as a JS based code, but run as a native app also not hybrid
i think Xamarin will give you better performance

PhoneGap performance is not good, you can always detect if the application is built using phone gap from slow navigation and delayed scroll.
Xamarin provides a performance almost same as native apps.
Both requires Mac to build the ios application but you develop using windows for getting the android application and once done just get a mac to build your app for ios.
Lastly use Xamarin forms for cross platform , it will save you a lot of time.
Xamarin is better than phonegap because it gives native app

Xamarin delivers Native Apps
PhoneGap help u quicker , better and has wide support "in the end its Javsscript"
Both needs a Mac to develop "at least to submit to AppStore" however u can rent a mac in the cloud
Phonegap / Cordova need Mac and XCode for iOS apps
